name: Spellforge
description: Your goal is to conquer each realm by defeating the inhabited creatures, including the guardian of the realm. To do this, you must complete the campaign missions, defeating the waves of creatures by casting elemental spells and destroying them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: I5-4300U Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: I7-4790K Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: dont like it infact hate it, if i could get my money back i would
